duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with guests to provide a great customer experience and assess their needs
Provide technical product education and articulate the value of the product
Facilitate guest transactions and execute omnichannel programs according to company standards
Contribute to a respectful and inclusive team environment and establish supportive relationships with all team members
Perform retail operations tasks and maintain a safe work environment

education_certification.credential: High school diploma, GED, or equivalent
